column17:
Product Description

This revolutionary sulphate free 100% vegan thickening shampoo and Conditioner are the first step toward thicker stronger hair. Do you often worry that your hair becomes completely oily & greasy at the end of the day? Do you feel the need to wash your hair daily? If yes then your hair is being robbed of its natural moisture. CetusTM hair thickening shampoo has natural extracts like those of lemon tea tree sage & peppermint to provide your hair that desired thickness delicious scent of lemons & the added strengthening. You will never feel the need to wash your hair every single day now & even if you do this product will make sure that the natural moisture of your hair stays locked in! CetusTM hair conditioner makes hair smooth silky easy to detangle and prevents breakage and split ends. It conditions your hair and leaves them easily manageable that too with a shine. CetusTM hair condition is lightweight silicone-free with unique organic extracts formula which gives your hair extra body along with stronger healthier hair texture.
